subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Martin, an ex-Yankee, hit a three-run homer in the seventh inning, the crowning blow as the Blue Jays restored their American League East lead to three and a half games.
snippet: Martin, an ex-Yankee, hit a three-run homer in the seventh inning, the crowning blow as the Blue Jays restored their American League East lead to three and a half games.
